00011 Vector2f Vector2f::reflect(Vector2f normal)
00012 {
00013     Vector2f result;
00014     result = subtract(normal.multiply(2).multiply(normal.dotProduct(*this)));
00015     return result;
00016 }

00018 float Vector2f::length()
00019 {
00020     if (m_Dirty) {
00021 
00022         float ret;
00023         ret = sqrtf((x * x) + (y * y));
00024         m_Length = ret;
00025         m_Dirty = false;
00026 
00027         return ret;
00028     }
00029 
00030     else
00031     {
00032 
00033         return m_Length;
00034 
00035     }

00038 Vector2f Vector2f::normalize()
00039 {
00040     Vector2f r;
00041 
00042     r.x = x / length();
00043     r.y = y / length();
00044 
00045     return r;
00046 }

00087 float Vector2f::dotProduct(Vector2f other)
00088 {
00089     float xt = x * other.x;
00090     float yt = y * other.y;
00091     return xt + yt;
00092 }

00094 float Vector2f::angle(Vector2f vector)
00095 {
00096     Vector2f v = normalize();
00097     Vector2f r = vector.normalize();
00098     float dProduct = v.dotProduct(r);
00099     return acos(dProduct);
00100 }

00147 float Vector3f::length()
00148 {
00149     if (m_lengthDirty == false)
00150     {
00151         return m_storeLength;
00152     }
00153     else
00154     {
00155         float computedLength;
00156         computedLength = sqrtf((m_vectorMatrix[0] * m_vectorMatrix[0]) + (m_vectorMatrix[1] * m_vectorMatrix[1]) + (m_vectorMatrix[2] * m_vectorMatrix[2]));
00157         m_lengthDirty = false;
00158         m_storeLength = computedLength;
00159         return computedLength;
00160     }
00161 }

00163 Vector3f Vector3f::normalize()
00164 {
00165     Vector3f normalVector(m_vectorMatrix[0] / length(), m_vectorMatrix[1] / length(), m_vectorMatrix[2] / length());
00166     return normalVector;

00169 Vector3f Vector3f::cross(Vector3f other)
00170 {
00171     float crossMatrix[3] =
00172     {
00173         (getY() * other.getZ()) - (getZ() * other.getY()),
00174         (getZ() * other.getX()) - (getX() * other.getZ()),
00175         (getX() * other.getY()) - (getY() * other.getX())
00176     };
00177 
00178     return Vector3f(crossMatrix);
00179 }
